problem.markdown:
>>What is one difference between viewing a Power BI dashboard on a mobile phone and on a tablet?<<
( ) On the phone, the data is not refreshed automatically. (x) On the phone, you cannot drill down on a report. ( ) On the phone, the number of tiles in the dashboard are less. ( ) On the phone, you cannot interact with specific elements on the tiles.
[explanation] You cannot drill down on a report when viewing with the Power BI mobile app. [explanation]
problem.p: What is one difference between viewing a Power BI dashboard on a mobile phone and on a tablet?
